about_the_game:
Join the Implant Corps!

Capture the most Holdouts!

Win the Forehead Chip!

A DIVIDED CITY




On our side of the city, everyone is civilized! We have chips in our hands! But across the harbour, in the Holdout Districts, lots of people remain without chips, and that's unfair. If you help capture Holdouts, you'll be rewarded!

In fact, if you capture the most Holdouts, you'll win the newest model of implant chip: the Forehead Chip!

ARCADE ACTION




Ride on a Dropship and venture into the uncivilized side of the city!

  • LOTS of Holdouts and Bosses to capture
  • Get on top of the scoreboard vs other NPCs
  • Unique capturing and collecting gameplay
  • Pickup, kick, and interact with stuff
  • Tight, tuned, responsive controls
  • Shoot cool weapons
  • Destroy AI robots and drones
  • secret alternate path(s)

INTERACTIVE STORY




Play as young Chip, just signed up by your parents to join the IMPLANT CORPS. For being lazy! Prove your worth to your noble father, to your worried mother, to your bullying brother, and impress that gorgeous hottie you like..... by winning the Forehead Chip!

  • A variety of locations to explore
  • Talk to characters, interact with gadgets and machines
  • Your responses + actions can change the story and lead to different endings
  • Dialog is optional - jump straight to action if you want

WARNING: if you dent the shiny surface of Arca City, you might find that not everything is as it seems...

IMPLANT CORPS




Join a noble outfit of the Implant Corps! Who dare to brave the slums of the Holdout Districts! Where vagrants without chips roam freely in wastes of garbage! Capture the Holdouts to prove your worth! The soldier who captures the most and gets to the top of the scoreboard will be chosen for the one and only Forehead Chip!

That could be you!

GAME MODES


Single player story mode, plus many local multiplayer modes!

  • Single-player
  • Two-player Co-op
  • Two / three / four player PVP
  • Over a dozen arena options and rule variants
  • Training rooms (tutorial)

SYNTHWAVE SOUNDTRACK


Awesome licensed soundtrack by amazing roster of modern synthwave artists!

You can already hear a sampling of the dope beats from Lazerpunk and epic melodies by Lukhash in our wishlist trailer...

Ten talented artists so far - and counting!

SECRETS


What secrets lie within the Forehead Chip?

That's for you to find out - in the game!

So get on a Dropship and start capturing Holdouts!

WISHLIST FOREHEAD CHIP ON STEAM!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 610M or higher, or Radeon 8400 or higher, or Intel HD 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended, not Required

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended, not Required

short_description: Be the first to get a chip implanted in your forehead! Join the IMPLANT CORPS and capture Holdouts in a 2D cyberpunk future - inspired by 80s and 90s sci-fi.
